Name: Coin of Ptolemy I
Description: Coin of Ptolemy I. Anverse: head of Alexander the Great with elephant's hide, diadem, horn of Amun and aegis on the right. Reverse: eagle with outspread wings above the thunderbolt on the left. In the field, on the left, a monogram. Mintage's position 13.00 hours. Double stroke on the anverse.
